original_title: The Fed is under full-scale assault. Jerome Powell is facing his toughest battle yet | CNN Business
article_summary: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is set to deliver a crucial speech at the annual economic symposium in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, amidst political pressure from President Trump to lower borrowing costs. The speech could signal potential interest rate cuts as early as September, due to growing signs of weakness in the labor market and the limited impact of Trump's tariffs on inflation so far. However, the Fed is facing a challenging decision, as any rate cut could potentially spur inflation.</s>
